unnormalised: Boro, mhonnlear tum online shoppingachea duniaent dhukouchi chintna kortai? Aizkal tankam norm zaata, punn satya zaunchea khatir, tatuntlea boreponnakodden asleli ankde samzop ek koddo zaunk xakta. Mhaka dishta, “flat 50% off” mhonnun konnacheach monant xirun poddonk na, punn tem disonam tenna thoddem khatin asta? Aami tem sarkhem toreant fulounk zatat je mhajea ajeakui somzachem (ani tika azunuy bazarat bhuzavall korpak avodtta!).
normalised: Borem, tumi online shoppingachea dukondant ubkartole mhunn chintanant asa, han? Aizkal hem sadharan zaalam, punn sach sangatam, te godd deal-anchea fattim aslele ankdde somzunk thoddem kotthinn zata. Mhaka dista, konnainch "flat panchas taka off" dda-kun olounk na, punn ti ddishta titli sopi na mhunn dislem? Mhunnun ami tem tech porim futt korun sangttole zoxi mhaje aaji somzhta, ani tinnem ajunui sthanik bazaarant mol bhaounk zai asa!

unnormalised: Poilem, tem sodhechem discount. "Flat 50% off on sarees!" aikopak bore dishta, sori? Punn asli kimot niyallunk sodtam. Zori ek saree ₹2000 (Rs. don hozar) asa mhonnun list kelam, ani tatunt 50% discount asa, todi tum ₹1000 (Rs. ek hozar) vachoitat, ani ₹1000 divn ghetat. Punn kednna kednna, ek dhok'ko aasu yeta. Zaite fautti tem 50% nirdharit vastuancheruch asta, nam tor tumche cartachem mol ₹5000 vo ani kuxik axil'lear lagoo zata. Sodanch, sodanch barik aksor vach!
normalised: Poilo mhunnllear, tem mohok diskaunt. "Sareencher flat panchas taka off!" aikunk khup borem ddishta, barobar? Punn sodanch original mol check kara. Zoddhi ek saree don hozaramni ddihta, ani tacher panchas taka diskaunt asa, tumi sachin eka hozara taka bachaitat, ani eka hozara taka bhortat. Punn kenna kenna, tanntra asta. Hoi, hoi tea panchas takanche diskaunt fokot nivddak vastuncher asta, voi tumche kartache mol panch hozar taka vo adhik zata zalearuch lagu zata. Sodanch, sodanch barik aksar vachat!

unnormalised: Uprant yetat delivery che charges. Zaite sites “free delivery above ₹499” (Rs. charxim ekunnpanannoy) dita. Mhonnche, zori tum ₹450 (Rs. charxim pon'nas) khorchun gheunk sodh'tat, tum ek unnem vostu dhumavpak zatat ani shippingacher vachoup zatat. Vachoup kor mhonnlear ek extra bar of chocolate free melloup... lagichech! Hanv sadharan extra Maggi packets ghetam.
normalised: Uprant delivery charges astata. Zaiti sites "charso ninnav taka voir free delivery" dita. Mhunnun, tumi zoddhi charso pannasa taka-anche vastun ghetat, tumhi tem mull udhyog aur deliveryachea takenche bachav korunk fattim poddunk ek dhakttuli vastun ghetunk chahatat. To bachao, eka extra choklettache bachao porim vichar kara... lagibhag! Hanv samanya mhunnun extra Maggi pakett ghetam.

unnormalised: Atam, cashback offers vixim uloya. Paytm vo PhonePe sarkhe sites tum taka dakhoun zata ten'na cashback ditat. Tumak "Get 10% cashback, up to ₹100 (Rs. ek hozar)" tumche khorchuk dakhoun yeta. Mhonnche tum ₹500 (Rs. panch hozar) khorchitan, tumaka ₹50 mellat. Tum ₹2000 (Rs. don hozar) khorchitan, torui tumaka ₹100 mellat, kiteak tor tem uttam limit zaata.
normalised: Ata cashback offer-ancher ulounk zai. P-a-y-t-m vo P-h-o-n-e-P-e porishe sites tumchi payment-achea zariyantun karta zalear cashback ditat. Tumi tea velar "Daha taka cashback, eka hozaramni" tumchea purchaisecher pollovunk zata. Tyacho orth tumi panch hozar taka kharch korta zalear pannaas taka fattim melltait. Tumi don hozar taka kharch korta zalear, tumhi eka hozara taka melltait, karan ti maximum limit-a asa.

unnormalised: Ani ek chokchokun polloupaachem zaata EMI (Equated Monthly Installment) options. Zaite e-commerce sites EMI plans ditat, khasgi karonnacher telefone vo laptops sarkhe vostunker. Tanim mhonncho "Easy EMIs starting at ₹2000/month" (Rs. don hozar prottek mhoinoy). Punn interest rate uloychi mhunn yaad dovrat! Ek 0% EMI sopnancho disonam, punn tem khub unnem. Sadharonnacher, interest ghatak asta, todi tum jem ditat tem asli kimotakodden chodd asta. Tumchi aayek vichar, ti tumaka sakllem sangta.
normalised: Anik ek gozhal zashi tumhi loksh diunk zai ti E-M-I, Equated Monthly Installment options. Zaiti e-commerce sites E-M-I-anchi yozna ditat, khas korun mobail vo leptaap porishe kharachi vastunche sodankit. Teyan "Ezi E-M-Is don hozar taka prati mahino suru zata" porim vigyapan korunk yetat. Punn vyez dar tumhi factor karunk sodanch yaad dhara! Ek shunya taka E-M-I eka svapan sarkhem ddishta, punn tem durlabh asa. Samany mhunnun, tyachek vyez ghattant asta, te total amont tumhi bhartat ti original molekhana voir asta. Tumchi maik vichara, ti tumchi sodankit sangtai.

unnormalised: Ani tem dukhoiche convenience fees visronakat! Thodde platforms, karonnacher tickets bhuu korpaak, thoddi "convenience fee" vadaupak zatat, mhonnche, ₹25 (Rs. ponchis) ticketachea kimotichoi vadavuk. Tem thoddem disun yeta, punn vaddon zaata, khasgi karonnacher tum zaite tickets book kortat. Tankam sadharan 1.25% zai asat asli rakmek.
normalised: Ani tem pesky convenience fees tumhi visrunakai! Kanak platform, khas korun ttickett bokingachea sodankit, eka dhakttulik "convenience fee" tumchea ttickett molekhancher ghatunk yeta, munnya pandhra taka. Ti dhakttul ddishta, punn ti ektta zata, khas korun tumi anek ttickett boking karta zalear. Ti samany mhunnun eka point don pandhra taka prati takanche total amont asta.

unnormalised: Returns ani refunds tanchech niyom asat. Zori tum ek vostu portoita, tor refund korpaak thodde diss lagpak xaktat. Tum mhonncho "Refund will be processed within 7-10 business days." And kednna kednna, deductions asat. Udharanikhatir, zori tum coupon code vaparta, tor refund tum divpi rakme khatir zaum yeta, vastu asli kimti khatir nhoi.
normalised: Returns ani refunds-ankuy tanchea aaplea niyam-ank astata. Tumi ek vastun fattim ditat zalear, refund process thodde dis ghetunk yeta. Tumi tea velar "Refund saat-daah buznisse disanche bhitar prosess kortole." pollovunk yeta. Ani kenna kenna, tyanchent kaap asta. Misalkan, tumi ek cupan code vapartata zalear, refund fakt tumhi bhartat tea amontachi mellta, vastunche original molachi na.

unnormalised: Nimannem, seasonal sales dekhun Diwali vo Dussehra salesacher niyall douraat. Tankam zaite favyo deals astat, discounts kednna kednna thoddea utpadanacher 80% poriant vata. Tovui astana, yaad douraat ke hea sales zaite ugddapenne ugddapenne kortat, ani sokloun gheunk sopem zaata. Tor, sodanch tumchi pishad, veg-vegle sitesacher kimoti tulonat, ani tum sorkarach favo deal ghetat mhonnun sirkoron “buy now” buttacher marunk poile! Khuxi zaun shopping kara, ani hushear ravat!
normalised: Nimani, D-i-w-a-l-i vo D-u-s-s-e-h-r-a porishe seasonal selanche dekhrekh dya. Tyachent zaiti bori deals asta, ani diskaunt kenna kenna kashchich utpadanche asshtri taka voir vorta. Punnyad dhara tea selanche vigyapan khup sarkhem kortat, ani tea hype-ant foddlonk sopem zata. mhunnun tumchi tumchi sodankit kara, vegveglim sitesanch mol tulana kara, ani tumhi sachin bori deal ghetat barobar mhunnn tharavnk "buy now" botnaacher maarunk poilim! Anand shopping kara, ani buddhimant raav!
